      pre: The pool must have a size and be declared
      post: A new song is in the pool

    • Method Detail

      • addPoolSong

        public java.lang.String addPoolSong(Song newSong,
                                    int userIndex)
        Adds a new song to the app's pool (shared songs)
        pre: The pool must have a size and be declared
        post: A new song is in the pool
        Parameters:
        newSong - is the new song that will be added. newSong != null
        userIndex - its the user's index in the array of users, its used to update its category. userIndex>= 0
        Returns:
        A message if the song was added or not

      • addPlaylistSong

        public void addPlaylistSong(int selectedPlaylist,
                            int selectedSong)
        Adds a new song to a selected playlist
        pre: There must be a playlist already delcared, the user must have acces and there must be songs in the pool
        post: A song of the pool is added to the playlisy
        Parameters:
        selectedPlaylist - its the position of the playlist in the array. selectedPlaylist>= 0
        selectedSong - its the position of the song in the pool. selectedSong>= 0

      • newUser

        public void newUser(java.lang.String nickname,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    int age)
        Adds a new user to the users array
        pre: The users array must be declared with its size
        post: Adds a new user to the array
        Parameters:
        nickname - its the user's nickname. nickname != null
        password - its the user's password. password != null
        age - its the user's age. age>= 0

      • newPlaylist

        public java.lang.String newPlaylist(java.lang.String name,
                                    User localUser)
        Adds a new private playlist to the playlist array
        pre: The playlist array must be already declared
        post: Adds a new playlist to the array
        Parameters:
        name - its the playlist name. name != null
        localUser - its the user that created the playlist. localUser != null
        Returns:
        A message to let the user know that the playlist was created

      • newPlaylist

        public java.lang.String newPlaylist(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String[] accesUsers)
        Adds a new limited playlist to the playlist array
        pre: The playlist array must be already declared
        post: Adds a new playlist to the array
        Parameters:
        name - its the playlist name. name != null
        accesUsers - its a array of tye nicknames with acces to the playlist. accesUsers != null && accesUsers.length <= 5
        Returns:
        A message to let the user know that the playlist was created

      • isPublic

        public boolean isPublic(int selectedPlaylist)
        Evaluates a selected playlist if its public (this is used to display an special menu por that kind of playlist)
        pre: There must be at least one playlist in the array of playlist
        post: Evaluates if the playlist is public or not
        Parameters:
        selectedPlaylist - its the selected playlist of the user. selectedPlaylist>=0
        Returns:
        A boolean that determinates if its whether a public playlist or not

      • setGrade

        public void setGrade(double grade,
                     int selectedPlaylist)
        Updates the grade of a public playlist
        pre: There must be a grade made by a user
        post: Updates the playlist calification
        Parameters:
        grade - its the user's grade. grade>=0 || grade <= 5
        selectedPlaylist - its the selected playlist to rate. selectedPlaylist >= 0 && selectedPlaylist <= 30

      • seePlaylistSongs

        pre: A playlist must already be created
        post: Shows the songs in the playlist
        Parameters:
        selected - its the playlist selected by the user. selected >= 0
        Returns:
        The songs in the playlist

        public boolean haveAccesToPlaylist(int selected,
                                   java.lang.String nickname)
        Determinates if a user have acces to the selected playlist

        post: Determinates if the user have acces or not
        Parameters:
        selected - its the playlist selected by the user. selected >= 0
        nickname - its the user's nickname. nickname !+ null
        Returns:
        If the user have acces or not (boolean)
